org.apache.twill.internal

Class AbstractZKServiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.internal.AbstractExecutionServiceController
      • org.apache.twill.internal.AbstractZKServiceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, ServiceController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTwillController

    public abstract class AbstractZKServiceController
extends AbstractExecutionServiceController
    An abstract base class for implementing a ServiceController using ZooKeeper as a means for communicating with the remote service. This is designed to work in pair with the AbstractTwillService.

    • Nested Class Summary
